Detailed Description

Represents a token and it's location in a source code. Instances of this class are chained tokens from input files. By the following call, you should get the original source file, if the source is parsed correctly:. 

ASTM astm;
//
// ...parsing...
//
SourceLocation *token = astm.tokenFirst;
while(token)
{
    cout << token->token;
    token = token->next;
}

See also:
ASTM
